name: Boku no Natsuyasumi 4: Seitouchi Shounen Tanteidan, Boku to Himitsu no Chizu
name_original: Boku no Natsuyasumi 4: Seitouchi Shounen Tanteidan, Boku to Himitsu no Chizu
description: Boku no Natsuyasumi 4 (ぼくのなつやすみ4 瀬戸内少年探偵団「ボクと秘密の地図」) is a Adventure video game published by Sony released on July 2nd, 2009 for the PlayStation Portable.
